scenario_text.value: Enough, Kaito! This needs to stop!!!

(Whoa, Miu seems even angrier with Kaito than
usual...)

(I bet he’s getting overbearing again. “Brush
your teeth,” “don’t catch a cold”...)

I don’t know if you’re stuck in the past or
what, but I can think for myself, you know!
(...Huh. She looks more serious than usual.)

What’re you saying? You’re still a kid! Just
let me protect you, already.

I’ll keep you safe, no matter what happens.
Don’t worry, it’s no biggie for me.
*sigh*...

You’re always going on and on about how
you’re “doing this for me.”

Well, it’s a huge pain, okay? Why can’t you
see that?!
Miu, wait! Come on!
...Kaito.

What?! Oh, Takuma, it’s you. Sorry you had to
see that.

Uh, sorry, I didn’t mean to spy on you guys
or anything.

You ain’t spying if we ain’t hiding. It’s
always like this.
You say so, but it looks pretty heavy to me.

Hey, Takuma. Is having a overprotective
brother really all that bad?

Bad? Hmm, not sure. I guess it depends on the
one being protected?
I see... Jeez.

Miu, man. She’s had so many rough experiences
up to now.

That’s why I just wanna protect her from this
nutty place.

The fact I’m being a loudmouth doesn’t escape
me. But she’s still just a kid, y’know?

I’m her older brother, and I just want her
safe. I don’t wanna see her sad anymore.
Kaito...

I don’t think there’s anything weird about
wanting to protect your family.

It’s just, Miu must have her own reasons for
reacting the way she is.

You might be right. Miu’s got a childish side
to her, no doubt.

I just don’t wanna make the same mistake
twice. She’s the one who’ll suffer if I do.

That’s why I’m willing to play the bad guy,
even if she ends up hating me.
I see...
(Kaito’s will is steadfast.)

(From where I stand, he’s being a bit
overprotective for sure.)

(Still, I wish some of that determination
would get through to Miu.)
